languages.text: Атака по области наносит {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g} всем существам, оказавшимся в зоне ее действия. Такую атаку можно совершить рукопашным оружием в {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}ближнем бою{/g}, некоторыми видами дистанционного оружия и специальными {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способностями{/g}. ! Атаки {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacks}очередью{/g} не считаются {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}атаками по области{/g}.
languages.original_text: An {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g} deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to all creatures in its area of ​​effect. Such attacks can be made with {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapons, some {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} weapons, and through using special {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}. ! {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacks}Bursts{/g} are not considered {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Атака по области наносит {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}урон{/g} всем существам, оказавшимся в зоне ее действия. Такую атаку можно совершить рукопашным оружием в {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}ближнем бою{/g}, некоторыми видами {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacks}дальнобойного оружия{/g} и специальными способностями разных классов.

Атака по области наносит {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}урон{/g} всем существам, оказавшимся в зоне ее действия. Такую атаку можно совершить рукопашным оружием в {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}ближнем бою{/g}, некоторыми видами {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacks}дальнобойного оружия{/g} и специальными способностями разных классов.

languages.text: An {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g} deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to all creatures in its area of ​​effect. Such attacks can be made with {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapons, some {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} weapons, and through using special {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}. ! {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacks}Bursts{/g} are not considered {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g}.

Такую атаку можно совершить рукопашным оружием в {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}ближнем бою{/g}, некоторыми видами дистанционного оружия и специальными {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способностями{/g}. ! Атаки {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacks}очередью{/g} не считаются {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}атаками по области{/g}.

traits.locale_text: An {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g} deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to all creatures in its area of ​​effect. Such attacks can be made with {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapons, some {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} weapons, and through using special {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}. ! {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacks}Bursts{/g} are not considered {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g}.

An {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g} deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to all creatures in its area of ​​effect. Such attacks can be made with {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapons, some {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} weapons, and through using special {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}. ! {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacks}Bursts{/g} are not considered {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g}.

An {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g} deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to all creatures in its area of ​​effect. Such attacks can be made with {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapons, some {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} weapons, and through using special {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}.

languages.text: Ein {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}Flächenangriff{/g} fügt allen Kreaturen im Wirkungsbereich {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} zu. Derartige Angriffe können mit {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampfwaffen{/g}, einigen {g|Encyclopedia:Range}Fernkampfwaffen{/g} und mit speziellen {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeiten{/g} ausgeführt werden. ! {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacks}Salven{/g} gelten nicht als {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}Flächenangriffe{/g}.
languages.original_text: An {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g} deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to all creatures in its area of ​​effect. Such attacks can be made with {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapons, some {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} weapons, and through using special {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}. ! {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacks}Bursts{/g} are not considered {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Ein {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}Flächenangriff{/g} fügt allen Kreaturen im Wirkungsbereich {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} zu. Derartige Angriffe können mit {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampf{/g}waffen, einigen {g|Encyclopedia:Range}Fernkampf{/g}waffen und mit speziellen {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeiten{/g} ausgeführt werden. ! {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacks}Salven{/g} gelten nicht als {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}Flächenangriffe{/g}.

languages.text: Une {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}attaque de zone{/g} inflige des {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} à toute créature dans sa zone d'effet. Une telle attaque peut être lancée à l'aide d'armes de {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}mêlée{/g} ou de certaines armes à {g|Encyclopedia:Range}distance{/g}, et en utilisant des {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacités{/g} spéciales.  ! Les {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacks}rafales{/g} ne sont pas considérées comme des {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}attaques de zone{/g}.
languages.original_text: An {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g} deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to all creatures in its area of ​​effect. Such attacks can be made with {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapons, some {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} weapons, and through using special {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}. ! {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacks}Bursts{/g} are not considered {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Une {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}attaque de zone{/g} inflige des {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} à toute créature dans sa zone d'effet. Une telle attaque peut être lancée à l'aide d'armes de {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}mêlée{/g} ou de certaines armes à {g|Encyclopedia:Range}distance{/g}, et en utilisant des {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacités{/g} spéciales.  ! Les {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacks}rafales{/g} ne sont pas considérées comme des {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}attaques de zone{/g}.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}范围攻击{/g}可以对目标区域内所有生物造成{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}。{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战{/g}武器、部分{g|Encyclopedia:Range}远程{/g}武器，以及部分特殊{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}都可以触发范围攻击。 ！{g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacks}连发{/g}攻击不会被判定为{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}范围攻击{/g}。
languages.original_text: An {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g} deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to all creatures in its area of ​​effect. Such attacks can be made with {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapons, some {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} weapons, and through using special {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}. ! {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacks}Bursts{/g} are not considered {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g}.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}范围攻击{/g}可以对目标区域内所有生物造成{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}。{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战{/g}武器、部分{g|Encyclopedia:Range}远程{/g}武器，以及部分特殊{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}都可以触发范围攻击。 ！{g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacks}连发{/g}攻击不会被判定为{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}范围攻击{/g}。

languages.original_text: An area attack deals {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} to all creatures in its area of ​​effect. Such attacks can be made with {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}melee weapons{/g}, some {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacks}ranged weapons{/g}, and through using special abilities of different classes.

languages.text: Un {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}ataque de área{/g} inflige {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} a todas las criaturas en su área deefecto. Estos ataques pueden realizarse con armas {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}cuerpo a cuerpo{/g}, algunas armas a {g|Encyclopedia:Range}distancia{/g} y a través de {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidades{/g} concretas. ¡Recuerda! Las {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacks}ráfagas{/g} no se consideran {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}ataques de área{/g}.
languages.original_text: An {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g} deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to all creatures in its area of ​​effect. Such attacks can be made with {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapons, some {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} weapons, and through using special {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}. ! {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacks}Bursts{/g} are not considered {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Un {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}ataque de área{/g} inflige {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} a todas las criaturas en su área deefecto. Estos ataques pueden realizarse con armas {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}cuerpo a cuerpo{/g}, algunas armas a {g|Encyclopedia:Range}distancia{/g} y a través de {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidades{/g} concretas. ¡Recuerda! Las {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacks}ráfagas{/g} no se consideran {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}ataques de área{/g}.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}範囲攻撃{/g}はその対象範囲内のすべての生物に{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を与える。このような攻撃は{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接{/g}武器、一部の{g|Encyclopedia:Range}遠距離{/g}武器、および異なるクラスの特殊{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}で可能。 ! {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacks}連射{/g}は{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}範囲攻撃{/g}とはみなされない。
languages.original_text: An {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g} deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to all creatures in its area of ​​effect. Such attacks can be made with {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapons, some {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} weapons, and through using special {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}. ! {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacks}Bursts{/g} are not considered {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g}.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}範囲攻撃{/g}はその対象範囲内のすべての生物に{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を与える。このような攻撃は{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接{/g}武器、一部の{g|Encyclopedia:Range}遠距離{/g}武器、および異なるクラスの特殊{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}で可能。 ! {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacks}連射{/g}は{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}範囲攻撃{/g}とはみなされない。

languages.text: An {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g} deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to all creatures in its area of ​​effect. Such attacks can be made with {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapons, some {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} weapons, and through using special {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}. ! Note: {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacks}bursts{/g} are not considered {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g}.

traits.locale_text: An {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g} deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to all creatures in its area of ​​effect. Such attacks can be made with {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapons, some {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} weapons, and through using special {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}. ! Note: {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacks}bursts{/g} are not considered {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g}.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}Alan saldırısı{/g}, etki alanı içindeki tüm yaratıklara {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasar{/g} verir. Bu tarz saldırılar; {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}yakın dövüş{/g} silahlarıyla, bazı {g|Encyclopedia:Range}menzilli{/g} silahlarla ve özel {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}kabiliyetlerle{/g} yapılabilir. ! {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacks}Seri saldırılar{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}alan saldırısı{/g} olarak kabul edilmezler.
languages.original_text: An {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g} deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to all creatures in its area of ​​effect. Such attacks can be made with {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapons, some {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} weapons, and through using special {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}. ! {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacks}Bursts{/g} are not considered {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g}.

Bu tarz saldırılar; {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}yakın dövüş{/g} silahlarıyla, bazı {g|Encyclopedia:Range}menzilli{/g} silahlarla ve özel {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}kabiliyetlerle{/g} yapılabilir. ! {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacks}Seri saldırılar{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}alan saldırısı{/g} olarak kabul edilmezler.
